text.section: Subject to the provisions of this section, the Board may waive any examination requirement of this title for an individual who is licensed or certified as a psychologist in any other state.

The Board may grant a waiver under this section only if the applicant:
Pays the application fee required by the Board under § 18-303 of this subtitle; and
Provides adequate evidence that the applicant:
Meets the qualifications otherwise required by this title; and
Became licensed or certified in the other state under requirements substantially equivalent to the licensing requirements of this title.
